function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Working in a laboratory setting with human cells and viruses poses a risk of accidental exposure and transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases to laboratory personnel and surrounding environment.","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to biosafety protocols, use of personal protective equipment (PPE), and proper decontamination procedures.","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, autoclaves, and UV irradiation for decontamination.","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers, and individuals working with the viruses and human cells.","Owner":"Laboratory managers, biosafety officers, and health and safety personnel."}]}
